resources.string: The Zakir Husain College of Engineering and Technology (ZHCET) was established in 1935, as a constituent college of the Aligarh Muslim University. The College has a land area of 113 acres and a built-up area of 22960 sq.m. The College\'s excellence was identified out of the 400 institutions across the country and was put in the list of seven selected Institutions to be upgraded to the level of IIT. It has been ranked 21st by the India Today among "India's Best Engineering College 2015". The college has also been ranked 35th in the "Top Engineering Colleges 2015" by Outlook India.\n\n The Zakir Husain College of Engineering and Technology has 11 Departments of studies. Civil, Electrical and Mechanical Departments are offering B.Tech/B.E.(Evening)/M.Tech. and Ph.D. programs. Electronics, Computer, Chemical & Petroleum Studies are offering B.Tech/M.Tech. and Ph.D. programs. Department of Architecture is offering B.Arch. Remaining three Departments (Applied Physics, Applied Chemistry and Applied Mathematics) are support Departments offering M.Tech./M.Phil./Ph.D. programs.

The Department of Computer Engineering was created in the Faculty of Engineering in the year 1991. The Department is currently running a B.Tech. programme in Computer Engineering and an M.Tech programme in Computer Science & Engineering with specialization in Software Engineering. The Department has also commenced an M.Tech programme in Computer Science & Engineering with specialization in Artificial Intelligence from the session 2020-21. The Department also offers Ph.D. Programme in emerging areas of Computer Engineering.

The Department of Mechanical Engineering is one of the oldest Engineering Department of Faculty of Engineering and Technology, Aligarh Muslim University, Aligarh. It is one of the biggest departments in the University with a student strength of about 700. It offers degrees related to Ph.D., M.Tech. (Thermal Engineering, Industrial and Production Engg., Machine Design, Robotics and Automation), B.Tech. and B.E. (Evening) programs.
Zakir Hussain College of Engineering & Technology

To become an institute of excellence in scientific & technical education and research with standards at par with national and international institutes of repute and to serve as quality human resource provider to the society and industry.

\n
To offer state-of-the-art undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral programmes. \n
To make policies and atmosphere to attract and retain best faculty. \n
To create an ambience in which new ideas and cutting-edge research flourish through effective curriculum and infrastructure so as to produce the leaders and innovators tomorrow. \n
To produce ethically strong and morally elevated human resource to serve mankind. \n
To undertake collaborative projects and consultancy for long term interaction with the academia and industry. \n
To be among top ten engineering institutes of India.
Zakir Husain College of Engineering & Technology\n Aligarh Muslim University\n Aligarh - 202002. UP, INDIA
